author: Pippa Stevens
title: Three before you leave — What to watch for in the market Tuesday
description: Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell will make comments, a host of economic data is expected and companies including Domino's Pizza and Levi Strauss will report earnings.
content:
Here are the most important things to know about Tuesday before you hit the door.We'll hear from Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell for the first time since key economic data was reported.
Last week, the odds of an October interest rate cut soared above … [+2311 chars]
